title: #85: Cannabis High Sobriety With Dr Sherry Yafai, Justin Hodak and Jessimae Peluso
description: Thank you for tuning into another interesting episode of Tin Foil Hat With Sam Tripoli.  This episode we discuss the revolutionary opiate addiction treatment taking place at the High Sobriety Clinic in Los Angeles.  Sam welcomes Dr. Sherry Yafai, Justin Hodak and comedian Jessimae Peluso to discuss their attempt to combat drug addiction with cannabis. Thank you for all of your support!
